extendedInfo.description: Caynax HIIT - High-intensity interval trainingHave You ever wanted to burn body fat and get perfect abs?Try interval workout to burn belly fat and then Caynax Aerobic Weider Six (A6W) app to form perfect 6 pack.High-intensity interval training (HIIT), also called High-Intensity Intermittent Exercise (HIIE) or sprint interval training, is an enhanced form of interval training, an exercise strategy alternating periods of short intense anaerobic exercise with less-intense recovery periods. HIIT is a form of cardiovascular exercise. Usual HIIT sessions may vary from 9â20 minutes. These short, intense workouts provide improved athletic capacity and condition, improved glucose metabolism, and improved fat burning.HIIT session consists of a warm up period of exercise, followed by six to ten repetitions of high intensity exercise, separated by medium intensity exercise, and ending with a period of cool down exercise. The high intensity exercise should be done at near maximum intensity. The medium exercise should be about 50% intensity. The number of repetitions and length of each depends on the exercise. The goal is to do at least six cycles, and to have the entire HIIT session last at least fifteen minutes and not more than twenty.There is no specific formula to HIIT. Depending on your level cardiovascular development, the moderate-level intensity can be as slow as walking.The original protocol set a 2:1 ratio of work to recovery periods, for example, 30â40 seconds of hard sprinting alternated with 15â20 seconds of jogging or walking.HIIT is considered to be an excellent way to maximize a workout that is limited on time.Because of exercise intensity this type of workout is not intended for everyone. You should consult:- health doctor to determine if You are capable to perform such exercises- professional trainer to create workout schedule for You.You can use this app for workouts like: Tabata, Fartlek, Kettlebell, jumping ropes, meditation, yoga and other fitness workouts that could use timer.Main features:- Enhanced timer- Workout schedule for next 30 days- Workout reminder- Option to change workout time for calendar days- Workouts list with option to create, delete and edit workouts- Workout schedule for whole week- Voice feedback - TTS countdown with option to edit spoken texts - You might need additional TTS software like IVONA Text-to-Speech HQ.- Beeps countdown with option to use built-in beeps or set any sound- Countdown: every second, every 'n-th' second, first 'n' seconds, last 'n' seconds, remaining last 'n' seconds- TTS/Beep information about workout stage- Rewind backward and forward- Built-in sample workout for Tabata.Check Privacy Policy for app permissions.

reviews.title: Great but needs volume option
reviews.comment: I love this app. Great presentation. Wish I could raise and lower the volume of the speech and beeps in app. It\'s too loud over online radio and turning down the master volume on the phone makes my music too soft. I manually lowered the dB of the audio files using sound forge. Kind of a pain :(
reviews.author: Corey Rollins

reviews.title: Missing features
reviews.comment: It\'s essentially just a beefed up metronome. No particularly interesting features.
reviews.author: Ben Boagey

reviews.comment: Solid app, has features I\'ve been looking for... VERY CUSTOMIZABLE!!
reviews.author: Danny H

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Initially had some problems, emailed the developers and dear Invisible Pink Unicorn are these guys efficient. Reply from them for assistance almost instantaneously.
reviews.author: Marc Tetlow

reviews.title: Quality Software
reviews.comment: Excellent, highly functional, well polished app. Definitely worth the $1.11
reviews.author: Drew Bailey

reviews.title: Amazed by app and developer.
reviews.comment: I had the free version and was totally satisfied with it. Top functionality, beautiful, user friendly interface.  I hate ads and I believe in supporting developers when they deserve it.   This one definitely does deserve it!  I made a suggestion via email, the developer responded immediately and actually uploaded a new version within 1 day or so, with my suggestion included. For just 0.50\342\202\254 ? Impressive.   Full 5 stars.  I highly recommend the pro version to support Caynax and developers like him.
reviews.author: Paris Papadopoulos

reviews.title: Nit much difference frm free version
reviews.comment: The workouts mentioned are either too small like 5 mins or too long like 44 mins. If I need to plan the workout myself then whats the point of buying the app.
reviews.author: Kapil Mathur
